title: Add `inactivity` penalties to Altair attestation rewards endpoint response
body:
## Description

A new `inactivity` field has been introduced to the attestation rewards endpoint response in #4474 for Phase 0, to include the inactivity penalty which is not part of the `head`/`target`/`souce` rewards. This hasn't been added to Altair and the implementation needs to be updated.

Relevant section in the consensus spec: [link](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/altair/beacon-chain.md#modified-get_inactivity_penalty_deltas)

### Example response

```json
{
  "ideal_rewards": [
    {
      "effective_balance": "32000000000",
      "head": "212426",
      "target": "212426",
      "source": "212426",
      "inactivity": "0"
    }
  ],
  "total_rewards": [
    {
      "validator_index": "0",
      "head": "212426",
      "target": "212426",
      "source": "212426",
      "inactivity": "0"
    }  
  ]
}
````

Beacon-API spec [here](https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Beacon/getAttestationsRewards) - Note the `inactivity` field is not included as part of the spec as of now, I'll create a PR shortly.
